vsParam:
To synthesize the vulnerary [c][DF1FB2FF]Healing Salve[-][/c], you need
[c][009C8CFF]Morning Dew Drops[-][/c] and [c][009C8CFF]Heath Grasses[-][/c].
[c][009C8CFF]Heath Grass[-][/c] is a kind of grass that grows all over the island.

[c][009C8CFF]Morning Dew Drop[-][/c] is a rare material
that can only be gathered [c][DF1FB2FF]during dawn[-][/c].

As long as you spot [c][DF1FB2FF]something gleaming in the grass[-][/c],
go and gather it.

Put these ingredients in the Cauldron,
then you can start synthesizing.
